channel.title: Kaitnieks
channel.description:
I managed to salvage some threads (first pages only) from Kaitnieks cheating forums as of December 2005. There's not a hell of a lot in there, maybe 200 pages, but hell, it's always cool to go back and reminisce. I'm currently hosting them on my googlepage site and they can be downloaded at the following location:
http://lucas.byrne.googlepages.com/Kaitnieks.rar
A pic of a thread I included:
[img]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/572/kaitniekspreviewthreadlj2.png[/img]

item.title: Kaitnieks
item.dc:creator: @Joey0509 Joey0509
item.description:
@Joey0509 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:16, topic:239566”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=315850.msg2510264#msg2510264 date=1225237399]
oh my god, youve found the decaying ruins of the before time…

beware young travelers, all is not what it seems, you may uncover things that your eyes where never meant to see.

YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
[/quote]You mean a functioning community?[quote author=Joey0509 link=topic=315850.msg2510904#msg2510904 date=1225271936]
I swear Kaitnieks used SMF, but obviously I have a bad memory.
[/quote]Horrible, horrible memory. You might as well do more crack.[/quote]
I was only about 11 when I was at kaitneiks.

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Joey0509:

I swear Kaitnieks used SMF, but obviously I have a bad memory.

Please fuck back to whatever corner of the internet you came from, because Kaitnieks has always used vBulletin (as far as I can remember, SMF didn’t even exist when Kaitnieks Forums started).

EDIT: minor edit

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks
item.dc:creator: @Ramenryoko Ramenryoko
item.description:
@Ramenryoko wrote:

cooper:

Wow, where have you been hiding Ramenryoko/Squigglyo? I haven’t seen you post since 2006.

It’s been a long road of hiding off the Internet completely, behind aliases, etc. Quite frankly I have just stopped going on other forums completely because I despise the way they’ve turned out, so I’m back…

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:10, topic:239566”][quote author=cooper link=topic=315850.msg2510317#msg2510317 date=1225238705]
Wow, where have you been hiding Ramenryoko? I haven’t seen you post since 2006.
[/quote]
Hah what about the poster just above you? Squig hasn’t been around (until the last few days) for something like 2 years.

Anyways, neat. I wonder if I can find something I posted and be humiliated by my stupidity.[/quote]
Fixed… wow I have a bad memory.

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks
item.dc:creator: @Ramenryoko Ramenryoko
item.description:
@Ramenryoko wrote:

[quote=“XharveyX, post:6, topic:239566”]http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.kaitnieks.com

because im cool.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 28 October 2008, 04:03:41[/size][hr]http://web.archive.org/web/20020923110749/http://runescape.net/

Lol its amazing what you find…[/quote]

Good job you found an archive of the homepages. Now try to find all the threads. It’ll take you a while. I didn’t just include the homepage in case you didn’t notice, I included over 200 posts I could find live. When you click on those posts\threads through the archive, all you get is “Not in archive.”

Read full topic
